page.brief: Change page of current Playlist. Page is automatically increased when current paage is completed. (e.g. 'prefix_herepage 4')

time.brief: Adjust the randomizing amount of seconds between images. Min=8, Max=180, Min-distance=20. (e.g. 'prefix_heretime 10 25')

site.brief: Change site of current playlist. (e.g. prefix_heresite [site_name_here])

tags.brief: Search for a tag, with parameters. `change_site [tag] (any | general | artist | copyright | character) (name | date | count) (result_limit)` ----- (`()` are optional)
